item.title: zoom-out
item.description: iphone zoom options # i apologe for the improper presentation here 🙏🏽 this should have been a simple image-slider/carousel so that you can clickly flick through the zoomed-in + zoomed-out views but i just spent hours tinkering the html, css + javascript code w/ claude.
